articles.title: Photos: Lexington Minute Men reenact historic battle that sparked the American Revolution 250 years ago - WBUR
articles.description: Two hundred and fifty years ago, shots fired in Lexington and Concord set off the Revolutionary War. A new nation, independent from Britain, was about to be born.
articles.content:
Two hundred and fifty years ago, shots fired in Lexington and Concord set off the Revolutionary War. A new nation, independent from Britain, was about to be born.

articles.title: Spring allergies are back. Here’s how to check pollen levels and keep from sneezing - AP News
